short_description: For those who want to tweet quickly while working...
explain1: TweetShot is a utility app on the menubar.
explain2:
You can easily display the editing window by a hot-key
and tweet quickly while working.
explain3: You can attach a total of 4 images or just one GIF animation to the tweet.
explain4: You can reply to your last tweet.
explain5: You can customize the settings and manage Twitter accounts.
